alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:43AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Harney and west central Malheur Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1143 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Duck Creek Butte, or 38 miles northwest of Rome. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Malheur Cave around 1230 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
